an3.136:4.1: “Mendicants, whether Realized Ones arise or not, this law of nature persists, this stability of natural principles, this invariance of natural principles:
an3.136:4.3: A Realized One understands this and comprehends it,
an3.136:4.4: then he explains, teaches, advocates, establishes, clarifies, analyzes, and reveals it:
an3.136:4.6: Whether Realized Ones arise or not, this law of nature persists, this stability of natural principles, this invariance of natural principles:
an3.136:4.8: A Realized One understands this and comprehends it,
an3.136:4.9: then he explains, teaches, advocates, establishes, clarifies, analyzes, and reveals it:
an3.136:4.11: Whether Realized Ones arise or not, this law of nature persists, this stability of natural principles, this invariance of natural principles:
an3.136:4.13: A Realized One understands this and comprehends it,
an3.136:4.14: then he explains, teaches, advocates, establishes, clarifies, analyzes, and reveals it:
